reviewText: transaction was very good, the video itself was not good, stan lee needs to stick to writing and creating and not putting his image into the animation

This is a awesome movie. I love the fact that stan lee uses himself as the guy who finds the aliens and turn them into comic book superheroes. the animation is excellent in this movie and I think the characters are well developed and that the plot is pretty cool. this movie was made for hard core stan lee and superhero fans. if you have not seen this movie then I recommend you do
Unfortunately the concept is all this movie has, no character development makes this a boring movie you will find yourself saying "Yea something is happening but who cares"....just rent it!
